attributes.additional_details: Reinstate the Halstead Town Police Station
attributes.background: Since the closure of the Halstead police station, there has been an increase in antisocial behaviour and it has come to light that our wildlife is now under attack and a duckling has died due to injuries caused.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local police stations are a matter for the local police force, not the UK Government or Parliament.
